description: This source file defines a Dart class 'Referral' used as a data model for representing referral codes and rewards within a mobile application, leveraging JSON serialization/deserialization.

classes.name: Referral
classes.description: A data model class for referral information including user ID, referral code, and rewards.

methods.name: Referral.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Referral instance from JSON data.

methods.name: Referral.toJson
methods.description: Converts a Referral instance to JSON format.
